questionTitle: When I went to talk to the manager, he told me he could only ________ me a few minutes.
There was a big hole in the road which ________ the traffic.
The factory paid ________ nearly a million pounds to their employees who were injured in the explosion.
I'm so out of ________ that I can't run ten meters without puffing.
He go out of bed and took a few ________ but couldn't go any farther.
You will have to repeat the course because your work has been ________.
________ the BBC news, the plane crash was caused by engine failure.
I tried ________ the bus, but I missed it.
She showed a lot of ________ in her fight against the illness.
I've ________ for a job in Mexico. I hope I get it.
Prevention is better than ________.
The class failed to respond ________ the teacher's new methods.
I am sorry ________ having asked him.
He turned ________ me for help.
Are you interested ________ opera?
How do you account ________ this?
Has it ever occured to you that those twins are quite different ________ each other in many ways?
I left the meat on the table and as the weather was very hot, it ________.
He and I don't get on. We rub each other up the wrong ________.
If you have finished your homework, you ________ check through it carefully.
